mapper.sql: id, platform_id, platform_name, inform_url, contact, tel_num, deposit_bank_name, bank_num, area, x509certificate, whitelist_ip, creater, create_time, modifier, modify_time
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from platform_info
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into platform_info (id, platform_id, platform_name, inform_url, contact, tel_num, deposit_bank_name, bank_num, area, x509certificate, whitelist_ip, creater, create_time, modifier, modify_time ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{platformId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{platformName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{informUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{depositBankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{x509certificate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{whitelistIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
